@Cooleditor: 
there's XviD.AC3-ViSiON and x264.AAC-ViSiON

that means both video and audio codecs are different.

Usually, xvid offers better compatibility (and lower resource requirements) whereas x264 gives superior compression (but is more demanding to the player)
